ComicInfo.Series: Red Agent: Island of Dr. Moreau
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now imprisoned on the island, and stripped of their powers, Red and Avril are shocked by the depths of Moreau’s madness, and by the strange society that she has created. They’re also surprised to learn that some of her creatures display far more humanity than their creator. And that humanity might be the key to saving their lives.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Riveiro & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Kevin McCoy & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Ian Richardson & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | VIP Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Sun Khamunaki | Missing | F | MegaCon Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Classic Fairy Tale Collectible Cover 2 of 5, Limited to 50 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | Subscription Pro Level Foil Collectible Cover, Limited to 75 | Paul Green | Missing | Note: The digital edition (4/1/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
